ygData.subject: Re: New Troll SK
ygData.msgSnippet: My ogre has 80int and could cast it JUST barely at 9 using all mana.
ygData.messageBody:
My ogre has 80int and could cast it JUST barely at 9 using all mana.


On Thu, 13 May 1999 pwolf@... wrote:

> From: <pwolf@...>
>
> I know your wrong...I currently play a human with 90 int, not til lvl 10
> can it be casted
>
> ----------
> > From: Carlos Alvarino <goeagles97@...>
> > To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK
> > Date: Thursday, May 13, 1999 12:27 PM
> >
> > From: Carlos Alvarino <goeagles97@...>
> >
> > I'm casting it with 90 Int as a L9 Human. Go figure. Make sure to dump
> a
> > training point in each of the required magic skills at L9.
> >
> > David wrote:
> >
> > > From: "David" <milamber@...>
> > >
> > > My INT is 115 (Dark Elf) and I can barely cast it at L9. It looks like
> it
> > > sucks all of my mana out when I cast it.
> > >
> > > -Tenin - Tarew Marr
> > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > From: Jeremy(home)
> > > To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 8:18 AM
> > > Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK
> > >
> > > My INT is about 80 (Human SK-Veeshan) and I couldn't summon at L9.
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Stuart Christian <stuartc@...>
> > > To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
> > > Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 6:08 PM
> > > Subject: [eq_shadowknights] New Troll SK
> > >
> > > I'm switching to the Rallos Zek server to kill a few of those goodie
> goodies
> > > and am wondering what my INT has to be to cast leering corpse at level
> 10?
> > > My troll now on E'ci is level 10, almost level 11, and still can't it
> and I
> > > don't want to make this mistake again. I believe my INT is around 62
> on
> > > E'ci. Thanks
> > >
> > > -Stu
> > >
> > >
